subject: Baseball
Steroids
Drug Abuse and Traffic
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: As baseball moves into the postseason, published reports linking players to performance-enhancing drugs continue to appear with the latest involving the Mets’ Scott Schoeneweis.
snippet: As baseball moves into the postseason, published reports linking players to performance-enhancing drugs continue to appear with the latest involving the Mets’ Scott Schoeneweis.
